meanings.definition: The quality or state of being generous and kind.
meanings.sent1: Her bigheartednesses shone through when she donated to the local charity.
meanings.sent2: The community was touched by the bigheartednesses of the volunteers who helped rebuild the playground.
meanings.sent3: His bigheartednesses were so immense that he even shared his last cookie with a stranger.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of selfishness, her bigheartednesses stood out like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The bigheartednesses of the firefighter who rescued the kitten warmed everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: Acts of kindness and generosity towards others.
meanings.sent1: The bigheartednesses of the neighbors were evident in their daily acts of helping each other.
meanings.sent2: During the holiday season, many people show their bigheartednesses by donating to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The bigheartednesses of the clown made everyone laugh and forget their worries.
meanings.sent4: Her bigheartednesses were like a soothing balm to those going through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The bigheartednesses of the teacher inspired her students to be kind to one another.
